definition: to give thought (to others)/to consider (other people's needs)/also pr. [zhao2 xiang3]
(chess) move/trick/all right!/(dialect) to add
to wear (clothes)/to contact/to use/to apply
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)

sentences.english: Miss Nien always has the best interests of her students at heart.
sentences.chinese: 粘老师总是处处为她学生的利益为着想。

sentences.english: Paul wants Christians to be governed by common sense that looks out for their fellow brother or sister.
sentences.chinese: 保罗要基督徒凭着常识为他们团契的弟兄姐妹着想。

sentences.english: He gropes for a lamp, tries to turn it on, knocks it over instead.
sentences.chinese: 男人摸索着想打开台灯，却弄翻了它。

sentences.english: Eager to get home, I took a shortcut through an alley.
sentences.chinese: 因为急着想回家，我就抄近路走小巷子。

sentences.english: For your own safety, do NOT see this man.
sentences.chinese: 因此，为了你的安全着想，请不要见这个男人。

sentences.english: Yet, young Chinese struggle to think for themselves.
sentences.chinese: 然而，年轻的中国人在为自己着想时却很费力气。

sentences.english: The highest SAN DE is in the interests of others.
sentences.chinese: 最高的圣德便是为旁人着想。

sentences.english: The rulers should consider the interests of the multitude.
sentences.chinese: 统治者要为黎民的利益着想。

sentences.english: I should scarcely have known you: you look like a lady now.
sentences.chinese: 然后她就四下里望着想找希刺克厉夫。

sentences.english: For your safety, please stand back from the door.
sentences.chinese: 为您的安全着想，请不要站在车门边。

sentences.english: Please be considerate. Keep this area clean and tidy. Flush after use.
sentences.chinese: 请为他人着想，请保持地方整洁，用后冲厕。

sentences.english: Wang Yao is anxious to find out the honeysuckle lumbago again.
sentences.chinese: 王耀急着想出门找忍冬，结果腰痛的老毛病又犯了。

sentences.english: Some people are not very considerate.
sentences.chinese: 有些人就是不替别人着想。

sentences.english: I'm trying to think of one interesting case.
sentences.chinese: 我试着想个有意思的例子。

sentences.english: For your safety the Mooncup is made from a special medical grade non-allergic silicone.
sentences.chinese: 为您的安全着想采用一种特殊医用级非过敏性有机硅。

definition: to put oneself in sb else's shoes
to take the big picture into consideration (idiom)/to work for the benefits of all
to take into consideration/to attend to
to put oneself in sb else's shoes (idiom)
heart and soul/wholeheartedly
to substitute for/to take the place of/to replace/for/on behalf of/to stand in for
to exculpate/to absolve/to exonerate
making an all-out effort (idiom); to try one's heart out/to do one's utmost
genuine and sincere (idiom)/wholehearted
comprehensive/thorough/to bring one's help/to assist
to attach most importance to
to empathize/to allow (for sth)/to show understanding/to appreciate
to throw one's life in for/to haplessly give one's life for/to sacrifice oneself torturously working for another or for a group/to pour in one's utmost effort/to shed one's last ounce of strength for
to strive one's hardest/to spare no effort
to share tribulations/to help sb with worries and difficulties
to get the desired outcome/to win favor by fawning on sb/to curry favor with/a fruitful outcome to reward one's labor
